alert.note: Alert for Colorado Springs Vicinity, Southern El Paso County, Rampart Range Below 7400 Ft; Teller County, Rampart Range above 7500fT, Pike's Peak Between 7500 And 11000 Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 19 at 3:32PM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A cluster of strong thunderstorms will impact portions of southeastern Teller, southwestern El Paso and northern Pueblo Counties through 415 PM MDT... At 331 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a cluster of strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Ellicott to Colorado Springs to near Fort Carson. Movement was south at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Southern Colorado Springs, Fountain, Manitou Springs, Hanover, Stratmoor, Schriever AFB, Fort Carson, Security, Peterson AFB, Security-Widefield and Cimarron Hills. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
